net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.datatype.adapter.jackson

Class DatatypeJsonDeserializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
      • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.datatype.adapter.jackson.DatatypeJsonDeserializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is the generic type of the Datatype to serialize.

    public class DatatypeJsonDeserializer<T>
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T>
    This is a generic implementation of JsonDeserializer based on DatatypeDescriptorManager so every Datatype supported by DatatypeDescriptorManager can be deserialized from JSON.
    Since:
    6.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    DatatypeJsonSerializer

      • getValue

        protected <V> V getValue(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node,
                         String fieldName,
                         Class<V> type,
                         boolean required)
        Gets and converts the specified value from the given JsonNode.
        Type Parameters:
        V - is the generic type of the requested value.
        Parameters:
        node - is the JsonNode containing the value as child.
        fieldName - is the field name of the requested value.
        type - is the Class reflecting the requested type to convert to.
        required - - true if the value is mandatory and an exception will be thrown if the value is not present, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the requested and converted value. May be null if not set and required is false.

      • getValue

        protected <V> V getValue(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode valueNode,
                         Class<V> type)
        Gets and converts the value of the given JsonNode.
        Type Parameters:
        V - is the generic type of the requested value.
        Parameters:
        valueNode - is the JsonNode containing the value.
        type - is the Class reflecting the requested type to convert to.
        Returns:
        the requested and converted value. May be null if not set.

      • deserializeGeneric

        public <V> V deserializeGeneric(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser parser,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext context,
                                Class<V> type,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode parentNode,
                                DatatypeSegmentDescriptor<?,?> segment)
                         throws IOException
        Generic and recursive implementation of deserialize(JsonParser, DeserializationContext).
        Type Parameters:
        V - is the generic type of the expected value to deserialize.
        Parameters:
        parser - is the JsonParser.
        context - is the DeserializationContext.
        type - is the Class reflecting the expected type of the value to deserialize.
        parentNode - is the JsonNode that has already been parsed (recursive call) or null if the value has to be read from JsonParser.
        segment - is the DatatypeSegmentDescriptor with the segment to deserialize as child of parentNode (recursive call) or null if the value has to be read from JsonParser.
        Returns:
        the deserialized value.
        Throws:
        IOException - if reading from JsonParser causes an I/O problem.

      • deserialize

        public T deserialize(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser parser,
                     com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext context)
              throws IOException,
                     com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        IOException
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
